attributes.action: Decorate Staff Sergeant Olaf Schmid with a Victoria Cross following his death in Sangin on October 31st 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given Staff Sergeant Olaf Schmid's bravery, record of success (Rendering Safe 64 IEDs and 11 finds of bomb making equipment) and commitment to defending this country - I am compelled to request he be considered for the Victoria Cross.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
